title: Understanding Maladaptive Behavior
text: Maladaptive behavior refers to actions or thought patterns that hinder a person's ability to adjust to situations. It often leads to negative outcomes.

title: Characteristics of Maladaptive Behavior
text: Consider how certain behaviors might prevent someone from effectively dealing with everyday challenges or stressors.

hintAnswer: Patterns of thoughts, emotions, and actions that are ineffective or counterproductive to normal, everyday life
title: Identifying Maladaptive Patterns
text: Which of the following best describes maladaptive behavior?
choices: when they exhibit enduring patterns of thoughts, emotions, and behaviors that deviate significantly from cultural norms and these patterns cause significant distress and impairment in functioning
genetics, brain changes, childhood trauma and abuse, cultural factors
Patterns of thoughts, emotions, and actions that are ineffective or counterproductive to normal, everyday life
